meanings.definition: Producing or capable of producing a desired effect
meanings.sent1: Her effectualness solution solved the problem quickly.
meanings.sent2: The medicine's effectualness in relieving pain was evident.
meanings.sent3: His effectualness plan to catch the mouse involved a cheese trap.
meanings.sent4: The effectualness strategy cut down on unnecessary expenses.
meanings.sent5: The effectualness approach led to immediate improvements.

meanings.definition: Having the power to produce a result
meanings.sent1: The effectualness method ensured a successful outcome.
meanings.sent2: The team's effectualness efforts led to a positive outcome.
meanings.sent3: The effectualness tool made the task seem effortless.
meanings.sent4: Her effectualness influence on the project was undeniable.

meanings.definition: Successful in producing a desired or intended result
meanings.sent1: The effectualness strategy yielded great results.
meanings.sent2: His effectualness leadership skills inspired the team.
meanings.sent3: The effectualness plan to surprise her worked perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The effectualness solution exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The effectualness approach proved to be the best choice.
